name: The tale of Gladwin Reed.
description:
The game when finished will be a lite horror/ puzzle game that has some rpg elements and most battles will be scripted or part of puzzles. 

Feel free to donate if you like the project!

Story telling is mostly environmental. 

Whats in this version? (Version 0.3)

Character name and appearance customization. 

Start of the story is in place.

Added 3 new areas.

Added 5 new progression items.

Added 50 new intractables. 

 Added new details to the undergrown.

Added multiple new key items.

Note - It is highly likely that saves from the Alpha will not work with newer versions.

Whats next?

Next up in version A0.4

Adding the house in the middle of the poison swamp.

Adding a way to win the multi plant encounter.

Adding random patrols to the undergrown.

Adding more enemy types. (Particularly plants and animals.)

Adding nightshade powder.

Possibly adding Bruce. (As mentioned in the lab notes)

Possibly starting the next part of the lab.
